info.title: Toolbar menu item.
info.description: Builds a toolbar menu item for all uses. The toolbar item can be of 3 different scopes as mentioned in the build function, one for every case of visibility.

const.name: SCOPE_GLOBAL
const.description: The global scope attribute for the item.

const.name: SCOPE_PAGE
const.description: The page scope attribute for the item.

const.name: SCOPE_DOMAIN
const.description: The domain scope attribute for the item.

parameter.name: $id
parameter.description: The id of the item (if any).

parameter.name: $class
parameter.description: The class of the item (if any).

parameter.name: $scope
parameter.description: This defines the scope where the item will be visible. The acceptable values: - SCOPE_GLOBAL, for global appearance - SCOPE_DOMAIN, for domain appearance - SCOPE_PAGE, for this page only. The above indicate what items will be removed on the next clearance of the toolbar.

parameter.name: $ico
parameter.description: Defines whether this item will have an ico. It can be used as DOMElement to set the ico.

parameter.name: $extra
parameter.description: Extra element to add to the menu header, if any. It is NULL by default.
